divs: sighting detailsfinished up playing basketball with siblings. my bro was on his cell phone a bright blue light caught his eye. we saw that it was a ufo. it was almost as high as an airplane about 100-200 feet away from us it was very fast hovered slowly for 00:30 seconds or so. it would hover down and up and around the costco store and across the street where we were it flew over the same parking lot we were in. it had 8 red circles on the bottom and 6 bright blue lights on the top of it, it was round it had brake lights so it might be some kind of government air force test on new top secret technology... it disappeared and reappeared once it. we lost it when it disappeared for good. i'll try and put the footage we took of it on youtube our channel is [link moved to fi section\cms\tg]
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Cypress
There were no other sightings in Cypress on or around January 24th 2012
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
